==Description==

Retrieve the author who last edited the current post.

==Usage==

%%%<?php echo get_the_modified_author(); ?>%%%

==Return Values==

; <tt>(string)</tt> : The author's display name.

==Source File==

<tt>get_the_modified_author()</tt> is located in {{Trac|wp-includes/author-template.php}}.
